author: gdamour
msg: GERONIMO-386: openejb cmp attempt to modify identity columns
o create a new PrimaryKeyGenerator which uses table auto-generated primary
key to generate the primary key of a CMP;
o reconfigure the itests CMP EJBs to use the above PrimaryKeyGenerator; and
o itests are now executed with Derby as the underlying database.

author: djencks
msg: implement GERONIMO-435. Every builder can specify the default parentId.  For services, a module can specify the empty string parentId="" to get no parent.

author: gdamour
